title.rendered: 2022 World Cup in Qatar Follow Your Team Travel Packages

content.rendered:
2022 World Cup in Qatar Follow Your Team Packages

We realize that the ultimate World Cup experience involves your own team, which is why we offer Follow Your Team packages. There’s absolutely nothing that compares to cheering on your team and showing your national pride at the world’s biggest soccer event. Whichever team you cheer for, we’ll arrange first class accommodations in Qatar, match day experiences including transfers, daily breakfast, on-site hosts and more. Let us take care of all the logistics to you can relax and focus on enjoying this once-in-a-lifetime experience.

Your trip can be further customized with private tours, pre- and post-tournament extensions, and anything else that would make your trip absolutely perfect. Space is limited, especially for high profile teams like USA, Mexico, Brazil, and England. Wherever your loyalty lies, we’d love to help you experience this iconic event.

Complete 12-night 2022 World Cup Follow Your Team Packages start at $18,145 per person. To get started planning your 2022 World Cup experience, contact one of our Sports Travel Specialists at 1-800-465-1765 or submit a Custom Trip Quote request.
